title: Sync tab and Restore previous session
content: Whenever I restore previous session, off bootup or opening firefox with tabs being sent from another device loading in, restoring closes the tabs I just recieved and they don't show in their recent history since they didn't fully load. It happens every once in a while with me being mindless, but would be nice QoL when its a loaded webpage from an app on the phone I then send to the computer that gets lost and has no form of history.
creator: jacobschlimmer

title: How to reset Firefox on my laptop from my android mobile device.
content:
regards,

The Firefox app on laptops and handsets runs very well. well synced too.

the problems I experienced were: when my laptop was damaged and had to enter the service center, I didn't have time to reset the browser. there are many passwords there. logging out of the device in the account settings menu from my android handset likely only stops the browser on the laptop from syncing with the handset, but does not delete the passwords already stored on the laptop Firefox app. (i've tried it on my desktop PC).

thanks in advance for the help.
creator: ilhamfird

title: Youtube resolution
content: Firefox forcefully downloading Youtube videos in 4K if available. I'm using also Chrome and Opera browsers and this is Firefox-issue only. Changing resolution does not work, it going back to 4K immediately. My PC is capable only for 1080p and my internet connection is not fast enough either. This makes Firefox mostly useless for watching Youtube because most new vids are 4K. I have looked at the settings from both Youtube and Firefox and I can't see anything wrong there.
creator: jyrimtlaitinen

title: Firefox searching in Google
content: I down loaded Firefox, and the search bar says I will be searching in Google. Is the way it works? Am I still protected by firefox when I search in Google?
creator: nelson55

title: Blocked PM and comment function
content: First, the problem does not occur using Chrome or Safari. On one site I visit regularly I am no longer able to use the PM and comment functions. I have checked with the site's webmaster and am confident the problem is not at their end. Suggestions short of deserting Firefox?
creator: joegazzo

title: Firefox not syncing
content:
Hi

I reinstalled firefox on my computer and it is not syncing any of my data. It shows a moving circle every time I sync and yet the browser didn't sync my data when the circle stopped moving.

I appreciate your help!
creator: shmuel.frederick
